1.png.description: The white paper towel is partially visible on the right side of the image, near the sink. Moving right will bring it more into view and closer to the center.

2.png.action: go straight 1 meter — bad action - lost target
2.png.description: The white paper towel is visible on the left side of the image, near the sink. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it in view.
The white paper towel is partially visible on the left side of the image. Moving left will bring it more into view and closer to the center.

3.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
3.png.description: The white paper towel is not visible in the current image.

4.png.action: go left 1 meter — bad action - lost target
4.png.description: The white paper towel is partially visible on the counter near the sink, slightly to the left. Moving left will help center it in the frame and bring it closer.
The white paper towel is visible on the counter near the sink. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it centered in the frame.

5.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
5.png.description: The white paper towel is not visible in the current image.

6.png.description: The white paper towel is visible on the counter near the sink. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it centered in the frame.

7.png.description: The white paper towel is partially visible on the left edge of the image. Moving left will bring it more into view and closer to the center.

8.png.description: The white paper towel is clearly visible and centered in the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.
